Articles.Content:
Hi guys and hello.

I finally made the step 

I have been an active reader of this forum and player of KSP since the early days of the beta and have now decided to start and get active in the forum. I will try and focus on helping new players get the hang of the game and posting answers in the "Questions" portion of the Forum.

I have clocked in about 800 Hours of KSP, both modded and unmodded versions and am at the moment starting my first Video series of a modded KSP Career.

I hope i will lean to love this forum as an active member as much as i already loved it as a passive reader and I'l see you guys in the future.

 

Have a nice day!

Hello YTNewneo, and welcome to the forum!

It's always a pleasure to welcome a lurker into the fold.

Happy landings!

The Best Aspects of this Forum

- These people are probably the most intelligent gamers I have ever seen

- The kindest people on the internet, unlike some websites I've seen.

- Practically everything you post on the spacecraft exchange will get a "nice job there" or "interesting concept" comment, and a few likes.

 

The Not-so-Good Aspects of this Forum

- There's this chupacabra named Matuchkin. Don't look him in the eyes when you talk to him. If he starts getting passive-aggressive, hide your kids, hide your wife, because stuff's about to get real.
